response.original_title: Lingerie Fighting Championships 18: Lace vs Leather
response.overview: Lingerie Fighting Championships 18: Lace vs Leather takes fans behind the scenes of the world's most controversial MMA league as coaches and fighters prepare for LFC18, where beautiful mixed martial artists do battle in lingerie. Seen through the eyes of two of the league's newest members, Lingerie Football star Michelle ""Scrapper"" Blanchard and former pro wrestler Arik Loegen, LFC is an entertaining mix of combat sports, drama and humor in the tradition of UFC and WWE.
response.title: Lingerie Fighting Championships 18: Lace vs Leather
